external_references.description: Nikita Rostovcev. (2022, August 18). APT41 World Tour 2021 on a tight schedule. Retrieved February 22, 2024.

description: To support initial access, [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) gained access to databases with information about existing accounts and lists of employees.(Citation: Rostovcev APT41 2021)
